alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Highlands, eastern Hardee, central Charlotte, DeSoto and north central Lee Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 629 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Lake Placid to 8 miles south of Southeast Arcadia to near Charlotte County Airport. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, North Port, Punta Gorda, Arcadia, Port Charlotte, Babcock Webb Wma, Southeast Arcadia, Babcock Ranch, Charlotte County Airport, Palmona Park, Sweetwater, Burnt Store Marina, Nocatee, Brownville, Harbour Heights, Cleveland, Solana, Fort Ogden, Charlotte Harbor and Tropical Gulf Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee; Inland Sarasota
